solution_line_template: First, find the price of the sandwiches ${sandwich_price} per sandwich * {num_sandwiches} sandwiches = $<<{sandwich_price}*{num_sandwiches}={sandwiches_total}>>{sandwiches_total}.
Now add in the delivery fee ${sandwiches_total} + ${delivery_fee} = $<<{sandwiches_total}+{delivery_fee}={subtotal}>>{subtotal}.
Add the tip to the price of the sandwiches ${subtotal} + ${tip_amount} = $<<{subtotal}+{tip_amount}={total_received}>>{total_received} in total.
